## üî• Featured Model Categories

### [Operational Fire Spread Models](operational-fire-spread-models-index.qmd)
*Core models used in fire management operations*

**Key Models:**
- **[FARSITE](farsite.qmd)** - Fire Area Simulator for complex fire growth
- **[FlamMap](flammap.qmd)** - Landscape-scale fire behavior mapping
- **[BehavePlus](behaveplus.qmd)** - Surface and crown fire calculations
- **[Phoenix RapidFire](phoenix-rapidfire.qmd)** - Australian operational system

### [Physics-Based Models](physics-based-models-index.qmd)
*Advanced computational models using detailed physics*

**Key Models:**
- **[FIRETEC](firetec.qmd)** - Los Alamos CFD model
- **[WFDS](wfds.qmd)** - NIST Wildland-Urban Interface simulator
- **[QUIC-Fire](quic-fire.qmd)** - Fast GPU-accelerated physics model

### [Coupled Weather-Fire Models](coupled-weather-fire-models-index.qmd)
*Models integrating atmospheric and fire dynamics*

**Key Models:**
- **[WRF-SFIRE](wrf-sfire.qmd)** - Two-way coupled atmosphere-fire model
- **[ARPS-CANOPY](arps-canopy.qmd)** - Advanced regional prediction system
- **[Meso-NH/ForeFire](meso-nh-forefire.qmd)** - European coupled model

### [Decision Support Systems](decision-support-systems-index.qmd)
*Integrated platforms for fire management decisions*

**Key Systems:**
- **[WFDSS](wfdss.qmd)** - Wildland Fire Decision Support System
- **[IFTDSS](iftdss.qmd)** - Interagency Fuel Treatment Decision Support
- **[Wildfire Analyst](wildfire-analyst.qmd)** - Commercial web-based platform

### [Smoke and Air Quality Models](smoke-and-air-quality-index.qmd)
*Models for smoke dispersion and impacts*

**Key Models:**
- **[BlueSky](bluesky.qmd)** - Smoke modeling framework
- **[HYSPLIT](hysplit.qmd)** - NOAA atmospheric transport model
- **[CMAQ](cmaq-smoke.qmd)** - EPA air quality model

## üåç Regional Model Collections

### North America
- **United States**: FARSITE, FlamMap, BehavePlus, WFDSS, FSPro

### International
- **Australia**: [Phoenix RapidFire](phoenix-rapidfire.qmd), [Spark](spark.qmd), [AUSTRALIS](australis.qmd)
